message: Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
I'm willing to take a bit less to avoid further inflation. Let's split it closer to 55/45.
You're losing value, I'm being generous
This is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to go 60/40, but if you keep rejecting, we'll both lose more.
You're running out of time, take it
I'm offering 65/35, which is a better deal than anything else so far. We're both losing money with each round. Let's be reasonable.
Getting closer to the end, don't be stubborn
This is my final offer. We're both losing a lot, but 70/30 is the best we can do at this point.  Take it, or we both get nothing.
Last chance, I'm taking most of it
This is our last shot. I'm willing to take 75% to avoid both of us getting nothing. It's a better deal for both of us than accepting your previous offer.
